headline: Why Tyler Technologies Stock Eked out a Gain on Thursday
summary: While this doesn't materially and directly impact Tyler, it does help lift its reputation.  The public-sector-focused enterprise software company managed to squeeze out a slight (0.1%) share price gain, thanks to its landing on a prestigious list.  Wednesday afternoon near market close, Tyler announced that it has been tagged a "leader" and "visionary" in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Cloud-Based ERP for U.S. Local Government.
